<SUBJECT>: Notice of Intent to Sole Source for for purchasing modular point-to-point IP radio systems
label: <FAIROPP>
<DESC>: The Federal Bureau of Investigation (FBI) intends to negotiate a one-time, sole source, fixed price contract with Tanc Systems Inc., 1531 OHara Court Clayton, CA 94517 for purchasing modular point-to-point IP radio systems. The purpose of this contract is to obtain modular point-to-point IP radio systems in support of Video Surveillance Unit (VSU), Operational Technology Division (OTD). Tanc Systems Inc., is the original manufacture and the only service provider for the modular point-to-point IP radio systems. Based on market research no other vendor can provide the custom servers that are compatible with this system.rThe FBI intends to negotiate with only one source under the authority of FAR 6.302-1. Interested parties may identify their interests and capability to respond to this requirement to the attention of: Montarious Usher, email address: bachason@fbi.gov by Friday, August 25, 2017, 2017 (1:00 pm Eastern). Emailed responses will only be considered. Information received will be considered solely for the purpose of determining whether or not to conduct a competitive procurement. A determination by the Government not to compete this proposed contract based upon responses to this notice is at the discretion of the Government.
<CONTACT>: Brittany A. Chason, Contracting Specialist, Phone 7039856129, Email bachason@fbi.gov - Lauren G. Caperton, Contracting Officer, Phone 703-985-6925, Email lauren.caperton@ic.fbi.gov

<OFFADD>: 26 Federal Plaza, Room 20-100 New York NY 10278
<SUBJECT>: VA HR-LOB hypercare, training, employee transition warning, and FTE Adjustment Factor
label: <FAIROPP>
<DESC>: Summary of effort:Â Mod 058 LSJ summary:rThe attached LSJ pertains to the issuance of Modification 058 to add within scope efforts related to VA HR-LOB based Hypercare, training, employee transition warning, developing views/alerts/notifications and pagelets and providing an FTE Adjustment Factor which enables the PAID Master Return interface to include this attribute in its outgoing interface file.  Modification 058 incorporates the requirements in Project Change Request (PCR) 033.  A full summary of all changes to this requirement are included in PCR 033 and are accepted and made part of this modification. PCR 033 also includes both IBM and VA responsibilities for the requirements being added to the task order under Modification 058.
<CONTACT>: Charles Thomas Ade, Contracting Officer, Phone 347-525-5151, Email charles.ade@gsa.gov - Eleanor Lincoln, Senior Contract Specialist, Phone 212-577-8624, Email eleanor.lincoln@gsa.gov

label: <FAIROPP>
<DESC>: The Federal Bureau of Investigation (FBI) intends to negotiate a one-time, sole source, fixed price contract with Gantz-Mountain Intelligence Automation Systems, Inc., 2700 Garden Road, Box 12, Monterey, CA 93940 for upgrade hardware for four (4) Intelligence Automation Systems (IAS) units. The purpose of this contract is to obtain upgrade hardware for four (4) Intelligence Automation Systems (IAS) units in support of Video Surveillance Unit (VSU), Operational Technology Division (OTD). Gantz-Mountain Intelligence Automation Systems, Inc., is the original manufacture and the only service provider for the Intelligence Automation Systems (IAS) units. Based on market research no other vendor can provide the custom servers that are compatible with this system.rThe FBI intends to negotiate with only one source under the authority of FAR 6.302-1. Interested parties may identify their interests and capability to respond to this requirement to the attention of: Montarious Usher, email address: bachason@fbi.gov by Friday, August 25, 2017, 2017 (1:00 pm Eastern). Emailed responses will only be considered. Information received will be considered solely for the purpose of determining whether or not to conduct a competitive procurement. A determination by the Government not to compete this proposed contract based upon responses to this notice is at the discretion of the Government.
